snippet: The Republican and Democratic State Conventions find one party fighting over the spoils of victory and the other desperately hoping for a comeback.
lead_paragraph: The Republican and Democratic State Conventions find one party fighting over the spoils of victory and the other desperately hoping for a comeback.

headline.seo: Texas G.O.P. Fights Over Spoils While Democrats Pray for Comeback
headline.main: Two Different Parties, Two Very Different Moods
headline.print_headline: Two Different Parties, Two Very Different Moods
